scripts.minify:js: for f in assets/js/*.js; do case "$f" in *.min.js) ;; *) terser "$f" -c -m -o "${f%.js}.min.js" ;; esac; done
scripts.minify:css: for f in assets/css/*.css; do case "$f" in *.min.css) ;; *) cleancss -o "${f%.css}.min.css" "$f" ;; esac; done
scripts.build: yarn run clean && yarn run minify:js && yarn run minify:css
scripts.release: yarn build && yarn version-bump && VERSION=$(yarn --silent get-version) && git add . && git commit -m "Bump version to v$VERSION" && git tag "v$VERSION" && git push origin main --tags && gh release create "v$VERSION" --generate-notes
